about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey with Galactic Conquest Universe, the pioneering real-time strategy game that redefines the genre with real-time voxel deformation. Experience battlefields that transform dynamically as explosions and environmental interactions reshape the terrain, creating ever-evolving tactical challenges.

Choose from six distinct factions, each offering unique units and structures, allowing for a multitude of strategic approaches. Manage a robust in-game economy with a comprehensive currency system and marketplace, enabling resource trading and economic strategies that can turn the tide of war.

Developed in Unity, Galactic Conquest Universe features a charming low-poly aesthetic, delivering a visually appealing experience that complements its innovative gameplay.

Prepare for a strategy game like no other, where the battlefield is as dynamic as your tactics. Command your forces, adapt to the ever-changing terrain, and lead your faction to victory in Galactic Conquest Universe.

Add to your wishlist today and be among the first to experience the future of real-time strategy.

name: Galactic Conquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6th Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Embark on an epic journey in Galactic Conquest Universe, a real-time strategy game with dynamic voxel terrain deformation. Choose from six unique factions, manage resources, and adapt to evolving battlefields. Experience innovative gameplay and tactical depth. Wishlist now!
